sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Determine whether to kill the main loop. This can occur for two reasons: (1) it's flagged in the config table, or (2) we have no more sys IDs in the computer table.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: (OLD) BULK_KillMainLoop
